scene_description_enriched: A haloed man with a white beard and hair, dressed in a purple and green robe, is seated and writing on a scroll. He is positioned behind a wooden lectern. To his right, a brown ox with horns is visible, its head turned towards the viewer. The background features blue drapery on the left and vertical grey lines on the right, suggesting an interior setting. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
